Sage.name: Sage
Sage.lore: The bastion of China, Sage creates safety for herself and her team wherever she goes. Able to revive fallen friends and stave off forceful assaults, she provides a calm center to a hellish battlefield.

spells.name: Healing Orb
spells.description: EQUIP a healing orb. FIRE with your crosshairs over a damaged ally to activate a heal-over-time on them. ALT FIRE while Sage is damaged to activate a self heal-over-time.

spells.name: Barrier Orb
spells.description: EQUIP a barrier orb. FIRE places a solid wall. ALT FIRE rotates the target.

spells.name: Slow Orb
spells.description: EQUIP a slowing orb. FIRE to throw a slowing orb forward that detonates upon landing, creating a lingering field that slows players caught inside of it.

spells.name: Resurrection
spells.description: EQUIP a resurrection ability. FIRE with your crosshairs placed over a dead ally to begin resurrecting them. After a brief channel, the ally will be brought back to life with full health.
